meanings.sent1: The princess wore the plumiest gown to the ball.
meanings.sent2: The hotel suite with the plumiest decorations was reserved for the VIP guests.
meanings.sent3: The plumiest cake at the bakery was decorated with edible gold flakes.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the plumiest in the choir, captivating everyone with its richness.
meanings.sent5: The plumiest velvet curtains in the theater added a touch of grandeur to the stage.

meanings.sent1: The orchard with the plumiest trees always had the juiciest fruits.
meanings.sent2: She made the plumiest jam from the ripest plums in her garden.
meanings.sent3: The plumiest tree in the garden was a favorite spot for the birds to gather.
meanings.sent4: The plumiest harvest in years brought joy to the farmers.
meanings.sent5: The plumiest pie at the fair won first prize for its abundance of plums.

meanings.sent1: The actor's plumiest performance received mixed reviews from the critics.
meanings.sent2: Her plumiest outfit turned heads at the glamorous event.
meanings.sent3: The plumiest car in the showroom had all the latest gadgets but lacked soul.
meanings.sent4: His plumiest speech was filled with empty promises and grand gestures.
meanings.sent5: The plumiest mansion on the hill was the talk of the town for its excessive opulence.
